table_description: A Droplet is a DigitalOcean virtual machine.

columns.name: id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each Droplet instance.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The human-readable name set for the Droplet instance.

columns.name: backup_ids
columns.description: An array of backup IDs of any backups that have been taken of the Droplet instance.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Time when the Droplet was created.

columns.name: disk
columns.description: The size of the Droplet's disk in gigabytes.

columns.name: features
columns.description: An array of features enabled on this Droplet.

columns.name: image
columns.description: Information about the base image used to create the Droplet instance.

columns.name: kernel
columns.description: The current kernel. This will initially be set to the kernel of the base image when the Droplet is created.

columns.name: locked
columns.description: A boolean value indicating whether the Droplet has been locked, preventing actions by users.

columns.name: memory
columns.description: Memory of the Droplet in megabytes.

columns.name: networks
columns.description: The details of the network that are configured for the Droplet instance. This is an object that contains keys for IPv4 and IPv6. The value of each of these is an array that contains objects describing an individual IP resource allocated to the Droplet. These will define attributes like the IP address, netmask, and gateway of the specific network depending on the type of network it is.

columns.name: next_backup_window_start
columns.description: Start time of the window during which the backup will start.

columns.name: next_backup_window_end
columns.description: End time of the window during which the backup will start.

columns.name: private_ipv4
columns.description: Private IPv4 address of the Droplet.

columns.name: public_ipv4
columns.description: Public IPv4 address of the Droplet.

columns.name: public_ipv6
columns.description: Public IPv6 address of the Droplet.

columns.name: region
columns.description: Information about region that the Droplet instance is deployed in.

columns.name: region_slug
columns.description: The unique slug identifier for the region the Droplet is deployed in.

columns.name: size
columns.description: Information about the size of the Droplet. Note: Due to resize operations, the disk column is more accurate than the disk field in this size data.

columns.name: size_slug
columns.description: The unique slug identifier for the size of this Droplet.

columns.name: snapshot_ids
columns.description: An array of snapshot IDs of any snapshots created from the Droplet instance.

columns.name: status
columns.description: A status string indicating the state of the Droplet instance.  This may be \"new\", \"active\", \"off\", or \"archive\".

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: An array of tags the Droplet has been tagged with.

columns.name: urn
columns.description: The uniform resource name (URN) for the Droplet.

columns.name: vcpus
columns.description: The number of virtual CPUs.

columns.name: volume_ids
columns.description: A flat array including the unique identifier for each Block Storage volume attached to the Droplet.

columns.name: vpc_uuid
columns.description: A string specifying the UUID of the VPC to which the Droplet is assigned.
